Author: pretentiouspast
Text: I'm in the same boat... relapsed and bought a scale... I'm 10 pounds heavier than I had guessed I was and 20 heavier than where I want to be. It's a horrible feeling

Author: janescandycanes
Text: i feel this. i have an autoimmune disease so working out is hard. i do isometrics and weight lifting where i can, and swim for cardio
